name: Axonite
description:
A Love letter to the Bitmap Brothers, Xenon2 and the Amiga.

Created for:

Itch.io Devtober

And

Syntax Bomb 'Go Nuts!' competition

Axonite is your ship and you need to blast your way for as long as you can.

The foes will come fast and furious. They will bank and turn and rotate around you firing and doing all sorts of other nasty things.

With immersive audio (provided by QasarBeach) and a bostin 16 bit house soundtrack that will make your Amiga cry and your Fairlight weep, QasarBeach has been heavily used to get the most out of every beat...

Enjoy both PC and MacOS versions with fully configurable  keyboard and joystick support!

With 4 difficulty settings and an initial 3 levels to fight your way through each with a more fiendish end of level Boss to beat with the wet end...

Featuring super smooth multi-parallax scrolling. Large number of shots on screen and more enemies you can shake your middle finger at. Plus the shop! 

Want to visit the shop, then collect those power-ups and coins and not forgetting Bart your droidly shop keeper who just might have something you want... or not?

Relive that 80's retro feeling. Finger mashin' sticky trigger, ear blastin fun...

You know you want to...
